attributes.action: Parliament to legislate for public to submit a vote of no confidence for Sunak.
attributes.additional_details: Due to asylum, spending money on Ukrainian war
attributes.background: Parliament to legislate to allow the public to submit a vote of no confidence for Sunak. This would involve creating a legal framework that enables citizens to express their lack of confidence in the mentioned individual through a formalized voting process.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be removed or for a vote of no confidence.
